personalMetaData.title: Web Developer
personalMetaData.about: Junior full-stack developer with a keen interest in all things web related, along with lower level languages such as C++. I have currently completed two years of my BSc in Computing and IT with distinction.

volunteering.aboutOrganisation: Code First Girls is a organisation dedicated to helping women access and excel in tech by providing educational opportunities. They have so far taught in excess of 14,000 women how to code.
volunteering.myRole: I am a CF:Girls volunteer instructor and I have led and assisted in the teaching of both Web Development and Python courses to students at Sussex University as well as online during the recent lockdown. I have been involved with GF:Girls for the past

volunteering.aboutOrganisation: Children of the Mekong is a charitable organisation that fights child poverty and aims to alleviate suffering in South-East Asia.
volunteering.myRole: I acted as a volunteer Web Developer helping to maintain and develop their UK branch website for

volunteering.aboutOrganisation: Sova is a charity that works in the heart of communities in England and Wales to support individuals with the aim to reduce criminal activity.
